fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: Under £100 Visit London's West End and see the musical Les Miserables at its new home the Queen's Theatre with Superbreak (01904 644455; www.superbreak.com). Prices start from £97.50 per person staying B&B at the four star City Inn Westminster with a top priced ticket to see the show. Valid Monday to Thursday until the end of September. Under £500 A twin centre holiday to Thailand costs £499pp with Tradewinds (0870 751 0004; www.tradewinds.co.uk) for departures between 10 May and 20 June. Three nights at the Bangkok Palace followed by eight nights at the Green Park Resort in Pattaya (room only) and return flights from London or Manchester are all included. Pamper yourself on a luxury spa break to Muscat, on the Gulf of Oman with Ebookers (0870 0433957; www.ebookers.com). Stay at the five star Chedi Hotel for £445pp including return flights from Heathrow and transfers. Valid until the 20 June. Under £700 Get fit and meet people on a tennis holiday to the Dolomites. Departing 6 June, Solo's Holidays (0870 4992299; www.solosholidays.co.uk) offers seven days for £699pp. The price includes flights, transfers and full board at the three-star Sport Hotel Panorama with heated swimming pool. For ages 25 and over. Walk, sightsee and relax on the Greek islands of Samos and Patmos (16-30 June) with Ramblers Holidays (01707 331133; www.ramblersholidays.co.uk). The £683pp price includes flights from Heathrow or Manchester, plus hotel with breakfast and dinner.
